equip_desc:
ADCP Seaguard II: The SeaGuard II (Acoustic Doppler Current Profiler) measures currents and can be coupled with additional wave direction, oxygen, conductivity, turbidity and temperature sensors. 

 ADP River Surveyor M9: This system was projected for measuring flow flux in rivers and open channels.

 CTD Swift+: Standard instrument used to obtain depth, conductivity (salinity) and temperature. In addition to these 3 main parameters, this instrument also provides sound density and speed values.
